price: [Se les dirá:] "De nada les servirá hoy [lamentarse] porque fueron injustos; ahora compartirán el castigo".
arabic: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِذ ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walan yanfaʿakumu al-yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fī al-ʿadhābi mush'tarikūna
